justification: Relevant experience of the candidate is predominantly in customer relationship management and not explicitly in business intelligence, lead generation, or the usage of BI tools like Power BI, SQL, and Tableau.
Leadership experience is present in the form of team management and client relationship leadership roles, which are relevant but not exactly aligned with the business intelligence focus.
No direct mention of experience with business intelligence tools, SQL, or Tableau; only Microsoft Office is mentioned, specifically Word and Powerpoint.
No mention of any programming skills such as C++, HTML, or CSS, which are desired in the job description.
Candidate has strong communication skills evidenced by roles in customer relations and interpersonal client management.
The bachelor's degree is from University of the Punjab, which is not mentioned in the preferred university list but is a recognized university.
Gaps in technical qualifications and relevant business intelligence experience are significant.

requirements.criteria: Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
3+ years of experience in lead generation or business intelligence
Proficiency in at least one programming language

input.job_description:
## Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist

Join **Innovate Connections Inc.** as a Lead Generation and Business Intelligence Specialist. You will play a pivotal role in driving business growth by spearheading lead generation initiatives and providing strategic insights through data analytics. We are looking for a highly skilled professional with a strong background in lead generation, data management, and business intelligence.

### Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute lead generation strategies using digital marketing techniques, cold calling, and data scraping tools.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize customer acquisition strategies.
- Utilize CRM systems to manage and analyze client data for lead qualification.
- Create and manage detailed project schedules and work plans, utilizing best practices and standards for project execution.
- Develop financial models and business growth strategies based on data insights.
- Utilize tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau for developing comprehensive data reports and dashboards.

### Desired Skills and Experience:
- Strong programming skills in C++, HTML, and CSS.
- Proficiency in digital marketing, email marketing, and social media platforms.
- Experience in managing large data sets and using BI tools (Power BI, Excel, Tableau).
- Excellent communication skills and ability to develop strong client relationships.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

### Why Innovate Connections Inc.?
- We innovate at the forefront of technology and enable our team members to grow alongside the company.
- We value data-driven decision-making and empower our teams with the right tools to succeed.
- Offering a supportive work environment and opportunities for career advancement.

### How to Apply:
Submit your resume and cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are interested in joining Innovate Connections Inc.
input.additional_info: Innovate Connections Inc. prefers candidates from recognized universities such as the University of Management & Technology and Lahore School of Economics. We encourage a remote working environment but require physical presence for team-building and strategic sessions twice a quarter. Relocation assistance is available for exceptional candidates. Our comprehensive assessment includes a technical test followed by structured interviews to evaluate both technical and soft skills comprehensively.
minimum_requirements: Experience with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, SQL, and Tableau
3+ years of experience in lead generation or business intelligence
Proficiency in at least one programming language

employment_history.details: Scan and Data Entry of all receiving & payable instruments. Co-ordinates with Accounts & Branch Manager on New Account Openings. Reviews & Process the Cheques as per Policy of Bank. Assisting Relationship Manager and managing team. Acquire New Business from Market. Make daily sales contact with customer & prospect through appointment drop-in, visit, telephone and Email. Serves as financial advisor for banking multi products. Acquire New Business from Market for Personal Loan, Credit Card and Accounts. Provides information/feedbacks for every customers query. Works with Sales Manager to book new customers for the Bank by cross selling cash management, FX, trade, insurance and asset products to generate fee based revenue and to capture current accounts and deposits. Responsible for quality & soundness of Sourced Emerging Corporate Accounts (KYC reviews, monitoring for due diligence, anti-money laundering procedures). Handling the SALES PROJECT in customer engagement center. Providing Exceptional customer service experience until car delivered and till aftersales. Booking test drives to increase customer footfall in showroom. Handling aftersales calls for service appointment/complaint/survey/feedback. Effectively manage client relationships and provide key strategic guidance. Lead the internal teams on account programs and projects to ensure all work is done on strategy and meets client's requirements and expectations. Manage the client throughout the life of projects and programs. Actively sourcing new business from the market. Effectively managing client relationships and providing them exceptional customer service. Maintaining relationship with sales & merchandising team for timely delivery.
